name: Matching Cats
description:
Kittens are really cute and fun pets, aren't they?

They have only one function, to be cute! They entertain us with comic moments without much effort, just being themselves.

With that in mind, we developed this game for those who love kittens and have fun with these unusual scenes that they provide us!

  • A relaxing and fun experience with 20 different levels, 24 fun hand-drawn kitty cards!
  • Enjoy calm and peaceful music to face the progressive challenges as you level up.
  • Memory game with puzzles, find the correct path by moving and matching the correct cards!
  • Release your cards for your collection, this game is for you who love kittens and puzzles!
